titles.title: San Juan Island National Historical Park Boundary Addition Act of 2005
To modify the boundary of the San Juan Island National Historical Park.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 5/17/2005--Introduced. San Juan Island National Historical Park Boundary Addition Act of 2005 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the property known as Mitchell Hill in the State of Washington for the San Juan Island National Historic Park.
